TITLE: Anthropic Said to Be Closing In on $300 Million in New A.I. Funding
SUMMARY: Anthropic specializes in generative artificial intelligence, a hot investment in Silicon Valley. The new funding could value the company at roughly $5 billion.

TITLE: 6 Podcasts to Help Navigate Your Career Path
SUMMARY: Check out these shows whether you’re looking to start a business, pivot to a new industry or just better handle office politics.

TITLE: How Waze Changed the Way We Drive
SUMMARY: A new book by the company’s co-founder Uri Levine offers lessons on succeeding as an entrepreneur.

TITLE: Entrepreneurs Flee China’s Heavy Hand: ‘You Don’t Have to Stay There’
SUMMARY: Weary of crackdowns and lockdowns, businesspeople are moving out of China and taking their wealth with them. Many have found a new home in Singapore.

TITLE: After a Burst of New Businesses, a Cooling Economy Intrudes
SUMMARY: The pandemic has brought a boom in entrepreneurship, but higher interest rates, a chill in venture capital and fears of recession now pose obstacles.

TITLE: FTC Chair Lina Khan on the Problems with Noncompetes
SUMMARY: The chairwoman of the F.T.C. argues in favor of a proposal to eliminate noncompete clauses from employee contracts.

TITLE: A New Area of A.I. Booms, Even Amid the Tech Gloom
SUMMARY: An investment frenzy over “generative artificial intelligence” has gripped Silicon Valley, as tools that generate text, images and sounds in response to short prompts seize the imagination.

TITLE: Los oligarcas engreídos rigen nuestro mundo. ¿Por qué?
SUMMARY: El culto al genio emprendedor, como Elon Musk o Sam Bankman-Fried, le ha hecho mucho daño a nuestra sociedad.

TITLE: Why Petulant Oligarchs Rule Our World
SUMMARY: The cult of the genius entrepreneur has done a lot of damage.

TITLE: A One-Woman Business Harvests Shellfish and Helps Protect Them
SUMMARY: Ana Shellem has found peace and prosperity while searching for wild species off the North Carolina coast for her one-woman sustainable fishing company.

TITLE: These Sustainable Watch Brands Make a Case for Slow Fashion
SUMMARY: “Five years from now, we’re still going to be improving our environmental impact,” one founder said.

TITLE: East Fork Pottery’s CEO Has Stepped Down. What Will Happen to the Brand?
SUMMARY: Since East Fork started in 2009, its fans have been drawn to a founder’s frank and candid style of communication. Can it stay transparent in a muddy world?

TITLE: From the DealBook Summit: Leaders Look Into the Future
SUMMARY: Groundbreakers at the conference were asked what’s coming next for the brain, climate, medicine, labor, security and business.

TITLE: Why the Owners of the Nets Are Funding Tech Start-ups
SUMMARY: BK-XL was set up to provide funding to entrepreneurs in Brooklyn from diverse backgrounds.

TITLE: What Is Prince William’s Earthshot Prize?
SUMMARY: The charity will award $6 million to five entrepreneurs from around the globe working on breakthrough climate solutions.

TITLE: A Scruffy Guitar Shop Survives the Chelsea Hotel’s Chic Makeover
SUMMARY: After a costly renovation, a landmark of Manhattan that was once home to Patti Smith and Bob Dylan is drawing a different crowd. Dan Courtenay, the proprietor of Chelsea Guitars, is fine with that.

TITLE: Is Rock Climbing the Future of Tourism in Malawi?
SUMMARY: The small country in southeastern Africa is leveraging its little-known rock cliffs and boulders to develop local interest in climbing — and to draw adventure tourists.

TITLE: Elizabeth Holmes Is Denied New Trial in Theranos Fraud Case
SUMMARY: The founder of the failed blood testing start-up Theranos faces a maximum sentence of 20 years in prison.

TITLE: China’s Business Elite See the Country That Let Them Thrive Slipping Away
SUMMARY: The business class, which shunned politics, is now questioning if there is still a place for it in a system dominated by one ruler, Xi Jinping.

TITLE: For These New York Farmers, Harvest Time Means High Times
SUMMARY: In fields from Sag Harbor to Ithaca, a new crop ripened this fall: cannabis plants grown for recreational marijuana.
